text:
dancing in the rain,
raindrops falling on my head,
little drops of joy

music fills the room,
my dad's old record player,
rock, pop and good times

my hands are freezing,
the snow is dirty gray slush?
wish it was summer

eight legs made of steel,
i love metal balls of yarn,
beep meow beep meow beep

my sword is pointy,
my vest and hat match nicely
ready for my quest
